title: Trade only:  T206 Powers for Powers
author: mybuddyinc

posts.post_title: Trade only:  T206 Powers for Powers
posts.post_content:
Gonna try a real "backburner" run of T206 Powers.  I have 3, all of which are SC Fact. 30, 24 Dist.  The following 2 are for trade for any other Powers backs.

[IMG]http://i13.photobucket.com/albums/a296/mybuddyinc/t206powers.jpg[/IMG]


I lost a great spread sheet with all front/back combos in my recent computer cash.
Could someone please provide me a list of possible Powers' backs (might be necessary for this adventure :o)


Thanks, Scott
[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Only 5 backs to acquire......

PIEDMONT 150
SOVEREIGN 150
SWEET CAP 150 Factory #25
SWEET CAP 150 Factory #30
SWEET CAP 150 Factory #649 overprint

Good luck,

TED Z

Thanks to all who have responded, emailed, and pm'ed.
I have received 3 new spread sheets, and all the info.



net54 is still the BEST !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :)
but, but, but....Ted dint say anything about a Hindu version. And Ted knows everything about back combinations, right?
